00051 GrTextureRect::GrTextureRect( const UPath& name, EFORMAT format, unsigned int width, unsigned int height )
00052 : GrTextureBase( name, GL_TEXTURE_RECTANGLE_ARB, format, kNoCompress | kNoMipMap, ETT_RECT )
00053 , _width( width )

00071 //----------------------------------------------------------
00072 void
00073 GrTextureRect::BindToFramebuffer( unsigned int attachment )
00074 {
00075         CHECK_GL();
00076 
00077         B_ASSERT( GetTexHandle() != 0 );
00078         bglFramebufferTexture2DEXT( GL_FRAMEBUFFER_EXT, attachment, GL_TEXTURE_RECTANGLE_ARB, GetTexHandle(), 0 );
00079         CHECK_GL();
00080 }
00081 
00082 //----------------------------------------------------------
00083 void
00084 GrTextureRect::UploadPixelData( int dstX, int dstY, int width, int height, const void* srcPels,
00085                                                                 GLenum srcFormat, GLenum srcType )
00086 {
00090         B_ASSERT( GetFormat() != EF_DXT1 && GetFormat() != EF_DXT5 );
00091         B_ASSERT( GetGLFormat( 0 ) != GL_COMPRESSED_RGB_S3TC_DXT1_EXT );
00092         B_ASSERT( GetGLFormat( 0 ) != GL_COMPRESSED_RGBA_S3TC_DXT5_EXT );
00093 
00095         Bind( 0 );
00096         bglTexSubImage2D( GL_TEXTURE_RECTANGLE_ARB, 0, dstX, dstY, width, height, srcFormat, srcType, srcPels );
00097         CHECK_GL();
00098 }

00101 //==========================================================
00103 //==========================================================
00104 
00105 //----------------------------------------------------------
00106 void
00107 GrTextureRect::UploadImage( bool mipmap )
00108 {
00110         unsigned int dataFmt = ( ( GetFormat() == EF_DEPTH || GetFormat() == EF_DEPTHSTENCIL ) ? GL_DEPTH_COMPONENT : GL_RGBA );
00111         bglTexImage2D( GL_TEXTURE_RECTANGLE_ARB, 0, _internalFormatMap[ GetFormat() ], _width, _height, 0, dataFmt, GL_BYTE, 0 );
00112         CHECK_GL();
00113 }
